original_text:
The Lord has stretched out his hand over the sea
    and made its kingdoms tremble.
He has given an order concerning Phoenicia
    that her fortresses be destroyed.
korean_text: 여호와께서 바다 위에 그의 손을 펴사 열방을 흔드시며 여호와께서 가나안에 대하여 명령을 내려 그 견고한 성들을 무너뜨리게 하시고

sentences.original_text: The Lord has stretched out his hand over the sea
He has given an order concerning Phoenicia
